question: 101. Please contact Robert Chen for ___ in purchasing office equipment.
102. The awards ceremony will be ___ on the third floor of the Park Station Hotel.
103. After Massey Corporation acquired Brawley, Ltd., the ___ of its stock rose twenty percent.
104.  In March, the Grand Symphony Orchestra will present an ___ 0pera by talented newcomer Maria Cruz.
105. We hope to send ___ tax documents to you by the end of the week.
106. All materials ___ for the upcoming seminar need to be copied at least two days in advance.
107. After the switch malfunction, electrical service on the main building was ___ restored at 8 P.M.
108. Traveling by train to Tokyo takes approximately one hour less ___ traveling by car.
109. Because Hong Kong is home to people from all over the world , a ___ of fashion styles can be seen in the city on any given day.
110. Midtown Hospital compares ___ with other hospitals and provides services at lower rates.
111.  ___ there had not been slight delays in the bus service to the airport, Ms. Suzuki would have caught her scheduled flight to Brussels.
112.  Magnum Plus cameras ___ very popular right now because they are so easy to use.
113.The most ___ memo from the personnel department announced five new job openings.
114. The board of trustees will ___ vote on the revised proposal at its meeting later this month.
115. Because of ___ extremely focused customer bases, small business owners can often respond quickly to new economic trends.
116. Payment is ___ at the time you check out of the conference center.
117.  Officials attribute the ___ in service to a software upgrade that makes the system run faster.
118.  Mark Jarvela, a junior employee, proposed an innovative project that has been funded by one of the organization’s biggest ___.
119. Fargo Electronics has ___ halted production of its newest line of video games until retailers have sold off the existing surplus.
120. Please note that this brochure is intended as information only and does not replace or ___ the product warranty.
121. The cost of round-trip air transportation is included ___ the nine-day cruise package.
122. Or.  Sato has indicated that there may soon be an ___ for an  apprentice technician in the chemical-production laboratory.
123.  Mr. Hernández is not available at the time the work crew is scheduled to arrive, and ___ is Ms. Hakkonen.
124. The meteorological agency recommended that tourists to the region be ___ dressed for frigid conditions.
125. Please ___ the bottom portion for your records.
126. Repairing the old copy machine would have ___ half as much as buying a new one.
127. The market-research department conducted a ___ on how often people listen to the radio while driving their cars.
128. Because the sales representatives were late leaving the office, there was very ___ time for us to talk before the client meeting.
129. Editors of the Financial Gazette reserve the right to review advertisements and correct ___ errors in spelling or format.
130. The National University plays an important ___ in preparing leaders for the country’s educational system.
131. Research suggests the health benefits of whole grains come from the ___ of all the nutrients, not just the amount of fiber.
132. Intercity Bus Company will be providing ___ bus service for holiday travelers next weekend.
133. Although Dr. Obetz is qualified in several areas, nutritional health is one of her ——.
134. The president of Corvatech announced that this year’s annual report is ready to be ___ to the company stockholders.
135.  The institution’s ability to meet its —– growth levels will depend on the commitment of all staff.
136. Some officials still need ___ of the importance of separate playing fields for young football and baseball players.
137. ___ all the candidates applying for the job, Mr. Wang appears to be the most promising.
138. In order to make room for new inventory, stores that ___ would not offer promotional discounts might advertise a limited-time sale.
139. The manufacturer guarantees that its cosmetic products are good for three years or until the expiration date on the package, ___ is sooner.
140. The analyst’s commentary in the progress report was sharply ___ of the leadership team.
